en.title: M2Pro Miner
en.subtitle: The world's first zkEVM Radio miners that can validate real-world locations
en.describe: Introducing the world's inaugural IoT Radio miner, equipped with cutting-edge SX1303 chips. This innovative technology facilitates Time Difference of Arrival (TDOA) network-based geolocation, optimizing the performance for MXC zkEVM hexagons.

en.title: NEO Miner
en.subtitle: The world's first zkEVM Radio miners that can validate real-world locations
en.describe: Introducing the world's inaugural IoT Radio miner, equipped with cutting-edge SX1301 chips. This innovative technology facilitates Time Difference of Arrival (TDOA) network-based geolocation, optimizing the performance for MXC zkEVM hexagons.

en.title: Bobber Miner
en.subtitle: Compatible with HNT network
en.describe: Works with Bobber app and its own network
